import React, { useState } from 'react' const Login = () => { let [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', dob: '', gender: '', mobileno: '' }) const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { let fieldValue = e.target.value setUser({ ...user, [field]: fieldValue }) console.log(user) } const validate = (name, email, password, dob, gender, mobileno) => { return ({ name: name.length === 0, email: email.length === 0, password: password.length === 0, dob: dob.length === 0, gender: gender.length === 0, mobileno: mobileno.length === 0 }) } const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() } return (
handleChangeEvent(e, 'name')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'email')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'mobile')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'password')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'dob')} />

handleChangeEvent(e, 'gender')} /> Male   handleChangeEvent(e, 'gender')} /> Female
) } export default Login;
